text:
Current Configuration of sapi_apache2.c shows
php_admin_value error_prepend_string ""
php_admin_value error_append_string ""

but real settings are: 
php_admin_value     error_prepend_string    "<font color=ff0000>"
php_admin_value     error_append_string     "</font>"

"
php_admin_value error_append_string "

is red ;)
creator: apache-bugs@jensthebrain.de

text: I'm just testing a patch for this problem.
creator: thom@planetarytramp.net
thom@planetarytramp.net
text:
This patch has been committed to httpd-2.1 and will shortly be proposed as a
backport to 2.0
fix merged into stable branch for 2.0.49
creator: trawick@apache.org
